snippet: Growth picked up last month at United States services companies, which have been a source of strength for the American economy.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management reports its services index rose to 54.5 in March from two-year low in February.
lead_paragraph: Growth picked up last month at United States services companies, which have been a source of strength for the American economy.

headline.print_headline: Service Companies Ticking Up as New Orders Expand
headline.main: Service Companies Ticking Up as New Orders Expand
